title: omg i cant get in contact with riot i rlly need to contact them i cant log in att the sup page when
body: omg i cant get in contact with riot i rlly need to contact them i cant log in att the sup page when  i try it i automaticly get singed out again so i cant log in and create a ticket so how shoud i do to get in contact with riot???

replies.body: It sounds like there may be some issues with your browser and that page. Try [**clearing your browser data**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or try a different browser entirely and let me know if you see the same behavior.
